description:
Speaker:: Jeremy Tuloup

Track: PyData: Jupyter
JupyterLite is a JupyterLab distribution that runs entirely in the web browser, backed by in-browser language kernels such as the WebAssembly powered Pyodide kernel.

JupyterLite enables data science and interactive computing with the PyData scientific stack, directly in the browser, without installing anything or running a server.


Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022.
https://2022.pycon.de
More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/LSVVWT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Jeremy Tuloup: JupyterLite: Jupyter ❤️ WebAssembly ❤️ Python
